articles.description: Elvis Presley wasn't just known for his acting and singing, but his signature style — and his hair was a major part of the king of rock and roll's fame.
articles.content: Elvis Presley is perhaps one of the best musicians to have ever lived. His soulful music and captivating dance moves kept audiences far and wide swooning over the crooner. Presley held the record for… [+3552 chars]

articles.description: Steve McQueen's five-film anthology won top honors from the group, with "Nomadland" and "Ma Rainey's Black Bottom" also earning major prizes.
articles.content:
The Los Angeles Film Critics Assn. convened virtually on Sunday to announce its 2020 prizewinners.

articles.description: The weekend box office continued to weaken as more theaters closed due to the pandemic. Wonder Woman 1984 may be a glimmer of hope on the horizon, as it may bring people back to theaters.
